branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder - Mechanically Jointed - Cam Follower Guide
branchCategory.description: <p>The rodless cylinder with a cam follower type makes smooth operation possible even with an off-set load.  This can be used in a offset loading situation, high accuracy and long strokes.</p>

breadCrumb.name: Rodless Cylinder - Mechanically Jointed - Cam Follower Guide

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY1C, Mechanically Jointed - Cam Follower Guide
branchItem.description: <p>The MY1C  Rodless Cylinders have a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure combined with an outer dust seal band to protect from contaminants. This design offers a compact footprint compared to rod-style cylinders. The integrated cam follower guide provides for smooth and precise slide table movement. Air cushions are standard and external shock absorbers are optional.</p>

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY2C, Mechanically Jointed - Cam Follower Guide
branchItem.description: <p>The MY2C Rodless Cylinders with cam follower guide improves the load capacity and moment resistance compared to the MY1C. An inner seal belt runs the entire stroke length of the cylinder to maintain air pressure enhanced with a magnetic dust seal band to protect from contaminants. The cylinder and guide components can be separated to allow easy access for maintenance without having to remove the workpiece from the cylinder. Air cushions are standard and external shock absorbers are optional.</p>
